short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances browsing with AI-powered chat, content summaries, and text translations in your preferred language.
short.ja: AIを活用したチャット、コンテンツの要約、テキストの翻訳でブラウジング体験を向上させます。
short.ko: AI 기반 채팅, 콘텐츠 요약 및 선호하는 언어로의 텍스트 번역을 통해 웹 브라우징을 향상시킵니다.
short.vi: Cải thiện trải nghiệm duyệt web với tính năng trò chuyện AI, tóm tắt nội dung và dịch văn bản sang ngôn ngữ bạn chọn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ W-Contech Gemini Chat & Translate 🌐

The ultimate tool for seamless translation and smart chat directly in your browser!

Discover W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat, an advanced Chrome extension designed to integrate smoothly with your Gemini account. Whether you’re reading international articles, need quick translations, or looking for smart chat assistance, this tool has you covered.

🆕 What's New in the Latest Version:
- Visit our Change logs page for all the details: https://pale-whimsey-eed.notion.site/Changelog-1094012b156b806aa64ae87b1bfc377c

🔑 KEY FEATURES:

🌍 Smart Summarization and Translation
  - Summarize entire web pages in the language of your choice with a single click (perfect for news, blogs, and articles).
  - Translate any selected text directly on the webpage into your preferred language for quick understanding.

💬 Integrated Gemini Chat
  - Chat with Gemini directly in your browser. Get real-time information and assistance with ease. Perfect for any queries or guidance, all without leaving your current tab.

🖥️ User-Friendly Interface
  - Enjoy an intuitive, easy-to-navigate interface. All translation and chat features are just a few clicks away.

🔒 Security and Privacy
  - Your API key is securely stored in your personal Chrome profile.
  - All chat and translation activities are handled through your Gemini account, ensuring that your data remains private, with no local storage of conversations or translated content.

-------------------

📋 HOW TO GET STARTED:

1. 🚀 Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. 🌐 Open any web page, then click on the W-Contech popup located at the bottom-right corner. Follow the popup instructions to proceed.
3. 🔑 Log in to your Google Gemini account and generate an API key.
3. 💾 Store your API key safely within the extension for future use.
4. 🌐 Start enjoying translation and chat services right inside your browser!

-------------------

🛠️ FEEDBACK & SUPPORT

Have a bug to report, a feature request, or other feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
Visit our Feedback Form to submit your suggestions or report any issues you're facing. Your input helps us improve the extension!

📝 Feedback Form page: https://forms.gle/KHioyjcQ1xKQt4AP6

Enhance your browsing experience with W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat today! Download it now and streamline your translation and communication needs like never before.

The ultimate tool for seamless translation and smart chat directly in your browser!

Discover W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat, an advanced Chrome extension designed to integrate smoothly with your Gemini account. Whether you’re reading international articles, need quick translations, or looking for smart chat assistance, this tool has you covered.

🆕 What's New in Version 1.1.2:

- Vietnamese Language Support: The user interface now supports Vietnamese, making it easier for Vietnamese-speaking users to navigate and use the extension.
- Full Gemini Chat Integration: Enhanced chat capabilities with Gemini for a smoother and more responsive experience.
- Sound Effects in Chat: Added sound effects to enrich the chat experience with Gemini.
- Improved User Guidance: Updated instructions for better clarity and ease of use, helping users get the most out of the extension.

- Translate any selected text directly on the webpage into your preferred language for quick understanding.

-------------------

📋 How to Get Started:

Enhance your browsing experience with W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat today! Download it now and streamline your translation and communication needs like never before.
long.vi:
# W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat

Discover **W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat**, an advanced Chrome extension designed specifically to integrate with your Gemini account. This tool is perfect for those who need assistance with translation and chat, all within a simple and easy-to-use interface.

## Key Features:

- **Smart Summarization and Translation:** This extension allows you to summarize the content of the web page you are visiting (news, articles, etc.) into the language of your choice. Additionally, it helps translate selected text on the website into your preferred language.

- **Integrated Chat:** Users can chat directly with Gemini, acting as an assistant that provides all the information Gemini knows. You can easily communicate from your browser, saving time and enhancing your experience.

- **User-Friendly Interface:** With an intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface, accessing translation and chat features is straightforward. A few clicks are all it takes to start using the extension’s services.

- **Security and Privacy:** All translation and chat activities are conducted through your Gemini account, ensuring that your data and information remain secure and private. Your chat conversations and translated content will not be stored anywhere, including locally on your device..

## How to Use:

1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Log in to your Gemini account to activate the features.
3. Start using the translation and chat services directly within your browser.

Download **W-Contech - Gemini Translation and Chat** today to enhance your online translation and communication experience!
